thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Carolinagyrl79
title: Excellent hotel
text: They took care of my needs. The hotel staff is awesome even the manager. I just really appreciate everything they did for me last weekend. Plus you can't beat the shuttle to/form the airport. Even if you don't want to stay in the city you can take the shuttle to the airport and ride the BART in to town.
